io.micronaut.security.token.jwt.validator

Class JwtValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.security.token.jwt.validator.JwtValidator

  • public final class JwtValidator
extends java.lang.Object
    A builder style class for validating JWT tokens against any number of provided encryption or signature configurations and any claim validators.
    Since:
    1.4.0
    Author:
    James Kleeh

    • Nested Class Summary

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  JwtValidator.Builder
      A builder for JwtValidator.
